code: var userChange={loginHandler:function loginHandler(event){event.preventDefault();var username=event.target[0].value;var password=event.target[1].value;var options={method:'POST',body:"{\"username\":\"".concat(username,"\",\"password\":\"").concat(password,"\"}")};fetch('./api/users/login',options).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(res){return console.log(res);}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});},signUpHandler:function signUpHandler(event){event.preventDefault();var username=event.target[0].value;var email=event.target[1].value;var password=event.target[1].value;var options={method:'POST',body:"{\"username\":\"".concat(username,"\",\"email\":\"").concat(email,"\",\"password\":\"").concat(password,"\"}")};fetch('./api/user/',options).then(function(res){return console.log(res);}).then(function(res){return res.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});}};module.exports=userChange;
